DishDescription: Warming soup with a freshly baked ciabatta roll
Atlantic prawns in a rich seafood sauce served on a cos lettuce salad with farmhouse bread and butter
Button mushrooms pan fried in a rich garlic, cream and Stilton sauce served on toasted ciabatta
Tender chicken breast strips, hand coated in a crispy southern fried crumb with delicious chicken gravy
Lightly coated calamari with a paprika seasoning and garlic mayonnaise
Halloumi sticks in a crispy crumb served with a sweet chilli dip
Chicken breast strips marinated in a paprika seasoning, drizzled with BBQ sauce served on  bed of salad
